original_text: “I am not guilty. I have not done anything that is wrong. I am pure and clean. “I am not guilty. I have not done anything that is wrong.
korean_text: 이르기를 나는 깨끗하여 악인이 아니며 순전하고 불의도 없거늘

sentences.original_text: I have not done anything that is wrong.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 잘못된 일을 아무것도 하지 않았습니다.
